title: 1907 Ty Cobb rookie Dietsche PC SOLD
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: 1907 Ty Cobb rookie Dietsche PC SOLD
posts.post_content:
Cobb's true rookie card, extremely rare back variation (Cobb's bio is different in the two versions, this one is the tough one), PSA Authentic (PSA now grades ALL postal used postcards as Authentic)

Very cool baseball content on back...

"Hit em where they ain't and life will be smooth"

(I couldn't agree more!)

One of the hottest cards in the hobby, still a loooong way to go in terms of rising value... SOLD

"Hit 'em where they ain't and life will be smooth."  Sage advice :)

Cheers,
Mark
great card!    great buy for whoever got it.
That's the copy I used to own. Regrets, I've had a few.
